[An highway to greenness]

The automotive sector is typically referred to as one of the most impacting industries. And even though many brands are now electrifying their fleet, this process doesn't come with its caveats.

Today, most car brands make use of more subtle visual or narrative strategies to associate their models (regardless of what kind of engine they got) to the concept of sustainability in their adverts on YouTube. There are plenty of techniques to do this—which are not always used together—but they are usually applied in the same way.

[Name of the website] is a collection of video and interactive content in which you will be able to view these strategies just by themselves, so that patterns become easy to recognise and assess.
